Title: Provide limited reference to newly created Excel.createWorkbook
Author: evantrimboli
Description:
Similar to `Word.DocumentCreated`, it would be helpful to be able to have some kind of access to the newly created document. As it stands, if you want to take an existing workbook and copy it with some slight you modifications, you either need to:
- Make the modifications to the existing workbook before cloning

- Use some external library like excel-js to make the modifications after reading the current workbook
EnhancedContent:
Similar to `Word.DocumentCreated`, it would be helpful to be able to have some kind of access to the newly created document. As it stands, if you want to take an existing workbook and copy it with some slight you modifications, you either need to:
- Make the modifications to the existing workbook before cloning

- Use some external library like excel-js to make the modifications after reading the current workbook
